Combat
Hit Points: 68 Armor Class: 22 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 20 (strength; trained); Swashbuckler: 15 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bola (+12 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+12 1d4+3 B; strength; expert); Main-gauche (+12 1d4+3 P/S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Fighter Weapon Mastery (Bombs): Attack Master (Simple Bombs; Martial Bombs)/Attack Expert (Advanced Bomb Weapons)
Finishing Precision: Has the Precise Strike and Basic Finisher features
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Swashbuckler Dedication: Class Trained (Swashbuckler)
Swashbuckler's Riposte: Has the Opportune Riposte feature
Unconventional Weaponry (Spirit Thresher): Weapon Familiarity (Spirit Thresher)
Basic Finisher: (1) Strike with a Precise Strike weapon inflicts +1d6 HP precision
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Opportune Riposte: (R) (Bravado) Strikes or attempts to Disarm the attacker in response to the triggering critical miss
Panache: Tumble Through and other bravado actions give panache that enables finisher actions
Precise Strike: Strikes with agile and finesse weapons inflict +1 HP precision, or +1d6 HP precision with finisher Strikes
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +14 (dexterity; master); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Evasiveness: Save Master (Reflex)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Flair Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and basic flair feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 7 allocated
Evasiveness Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, rogue dedication feature or swashbuckler dedication feature (currently 1) and reflex rank (currently 3) >= 2
Swashbuckler's Riposte Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and swashbuckler dedication feature (currently 1)
Swashbuckler's Speed Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and swashbuckler dedication feature (currently 1)
